Alignment Vertical Attributes
=============================



```
concept {
    IfcAlignmentVertical:Segments -> IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:StartDistAlong -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:HorizontalLength -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:StartHeight -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:StartGradient -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:EndGradient -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:RadiusOfCurvature -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcAlignmentVerticalSegment:PredefinedType -> IfcAlignmentVerticalSegmentTypeEnum
}
```
